attributes.action: STOP redacting the details of paedophiles named in taxpayer funded reports.
attributes.additional_details: Much was made, today, about not being able to put taxpayer funded child abuse investigation reports into the public domain without redacting the names of the people who have been found, by that investigation, to have been involved in child abuse and pornography.  Just what is the point of carrying out the investigation if the people who are paying for it are then denied the information by a gang of paedophile supporters who endeavour to avoid embarrassment to any colleague members of the establishment by covering up criminal activity.
